entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API proposal] Syntax changes for `field` keyword #74937
  • Offer "Use collection expressions" when the chosen overload would switch #74931

Closed

  • Upgrade to .NET 9 SDK #71084
  • Anonymous-Params-delegate is generated incorrectly with AllowRefStructFlag #74823
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35227.116 #74928
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35227.127 #74927
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.shadowDebug-35227.190 #74926

PullRequests

Created

  • Move to the real System.ValueTuple ref #74936
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update 'use collection expression' to support cases where switching to a collection expr will pick a ROS overload over an array one. #74934
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Added LSP support for document color requests #74933
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74935
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add LSP handler for copilot related documents #74918
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Simplify equivalence comparers #74932
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Always take ownership from UIThreadContext when rename commit #74889
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix copilot options default value handling #74867
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add tests validating a particular scenario #74921
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Avoid synthesizing incorrect `allows ref struct` delegate type parameters #74914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Initial work to create a service for returning related documents for copilot purposes. #74906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix broken url #74924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Field-backed properties: readonly backing field #74922
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use collection expressions #74920
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make semantic APIs return more consistent results for `new T()` expressions #74675
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add `IAnalyzerAssemblyResolver` public API #74820
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Handle infinite cycles through params collection initializers #74899
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow ref enumerators in async/iterator methods #74800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add required `--locale` option to BuildHost #74910
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
